item.title: Anti-gravity racing game Hypersonic GP announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC

From Kyoto-based mi-lan Studio.

Kyoto-based developer mi-lan Studio has announced Hypersonic GP, an anti-gravity racing game coming to PC via Steam. A release date was not announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

The ultimate anti‑gravity race.

Step into a dystopian world, gravity‑defying tracks where speed is both your greatest ally and your most dangerous foe. Inspired by 90s anime aesthetics and the classic anti‑gravity titles of yesteryear, Hypersonic GP throws you into the cockpit of one of 32 legendary ships and challenges you to reach the podium at hypersonic speed.

Core Gameplay

  • Intuitive Controls – A simple yet intuitive control scheme that puts you up to speed, with advanced mechanics for hardcore players.
  • Master Your Ship – Each vehicle behaves differently; learning its handling is key.
  • G‑Forces = Danger – Every meter per second adds a new layer of gravitational stress on the pilot.
  • Regenerative Brakes Refill Your Afterburner – The higher your speed when braking, the more you replenish.
  • Navigate the Track – Tight corners, loops, jumps, and alternative paths demand precision.
  • Manage Your HP – Low HP makes you and your opponents vulnerable to lethal attacks.

Unlocking True Potential

  • Enter “Berserk” Mode – Your pilot rage fuels the afterburner, overrides speed limiter—reach speeds beyond hypersonic thresholds.
  • Cost of Glory – Over‑exertion can kill the pilot; exiting Berserk leaves you fragile and open to opponent impact kills.
  • Legend or Sacrifice? – Decide whether to risk everything for the ultimate rush.
